name: Sidequest: Grand Quest
description:
Sidequest: Grand Quest - Version 4.1 Update (9/30/17)

Sidequest is a frenetic bite-sized RPG where a dragon has taken up residence on your tiny island and your sole responsibility is to appease his every whim! Explore the procedurally generated world to find the items and slay the monsters the dragon demands, then deliver them to the castle in the center of the island before the timer runs out! Fail three quests and your town is toast!

Controls (Keyboard):

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Pick Up

Blue Cards are Items, Red Cards are Enemies. "Pick Up" enemies to spawn the enemy to the board. Repeatedly run into enemies to destroy them, otherwise they'll bounce you around!
